channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: For Americans, "organizing" means registering to vote.

GOP Is Setting the Stage for a Possible Coup in 2024 While Dems Ignore Threat. https://t.co/gjQXl5jxkq
80% think "Web3" is imaginary. https://t.co/0L4GmSjo52
In a global economy, what the west is doing to Russia amounts to a blockade. I wonder if something like this could have been contemplated in WWII.

@CathyGellis yes, i totally agree -- but i've heard people, including a member of congress, express the theory yesterday. i also agree about the reverse-domino effect, it happened here in the US after vietnam. we never fought a war based on that theory again.
There is no such thing as web3.

This is why I think the â€œdomino theoryâ€ of Russian aggression is unlikely. Their military is being depleted if not destroyed by the war in Ukraine. The longer it goes on the safer the other former Soviet satellites are. https://t.co/gph2u8OffN
Caveat: assuming they donâ€™t use nukes.

A wordle hack.
Suppose you know the second and third letters, as above, and have eliminated a fair number of consonants, and are sure the first letter is a consonantâ€¦
Type a consonant and the next two letters into a web browser and check out the auto completes. Repeat.

I agree on most things with people who identify as â€œleftâ€ but I do not support their attacks on people with opinions they disagree with.
â€œI don't attack people. I attack ideas.â€
Good words to live by my friends, from a perhaps surprising source.
Look at all the rationales they offer. Some really disappointing ones from people I admire, like @aoc.
https://t.co/YIaGX2ggvO
Anne Tyler: "It would be very foolish for me to write, letâ€™s say, a novel from the viewpoint of a black man, but I think I should be allowed to do it."
What a world, where such an accomplished and respected author feels so intimidated.
https://t.co/4wUfG7TqJs
Pet peeve, people who post spoilers for Wordle. Come on, donâ€™t ruin it for others.
@stevebloom55 @jswatz Yes Iâ€™m sure.

It looks like all the really good stuff is on AppleTV+.
Cancel culture: A brief little listicle. https://t.co/kK4PnxEXSc
@GLuft3 I was on my way there, but I got ridiculously lucky.

we can have great writing and publishing software for the web, thatâ€™s better at archiving and searching, with no lock-in and no business model, and is a joy to use for writers, readers and students.
The promise of the web is still largely undelivered because Silicon Valley got in the way. I guess they gave us training wheels, but we donâ€™t need them anymore.
